title.narrative: Facilitating safe access to and within IDP camps in Idleb

description.narrative:
GOAL proposes to facilitate safe access within IDP camps in Idleb Governate, thus contributing to safer and more dignified living conditions for IDPs, and facilitating better access to basic needs. Through the construction and rehabilitation of infrastructure, focusing on roads and rainwater drainage systems within camps, 7,658 individuals will benefit from the intervention in Maaret Tamsrin subdistrict. Key activities will include: - Repair of damage caused by recent flooding and - Mitigation against the risk of future flooding, - Installation of solar lights to ensure safe access to communal facilities in the camps, which will also support in mitigating protection risks that women, girls and boys may be exposed to. A thorough initial needs assessment Annex A, has been conducted in order to select the locations and activities proposed below. Under this project, GOAL will target IDP camps within Maaret Tamsrin sub-district that are flood-prone, located on flood streams, or receive heavy rainfall and do not have the requisite infrastructure to cope. This project will focus on the construction and rehabilitation of main roads, secondary roads leading to communal facilities to ensure access of IDPs including elderly and persons living with a disability (PLWD), rehabilitation and construction of rainwater drainage systems and communal facilities will be provided with exterior solar lights. These activities will be implemented in 7 camps reaching a total of 7,658 individuals. Details of the proposed intervention are included in Annex C. Infrastructure Works BoQ, Annex D. Selected Camps Specifications and Proposed Interventions, and Annex E. details of the activities in the camps. An overall 7,596 meter of roads will be constructed and rehabilitated in the camps, Annex E provides the details of the road length, and average width in each camp. and an estimated total of 554 meters of rainwater drainage lines. The works will be carried out through contractors selected through GOAL competitive bidding process.
All proposed activities will be coordinated with the cluster.
